text:
Seems that there's a lot of people who don't know about the Tomcat 4.1.27 hotfix
because it's not easy to find as it's not linked off the primary download pages.
 A lot of people come through the tomcat-user list with issues fixed by the
hotfix and can't find the hotfix.

It seems that the best way to fix this issue is to rebundle 4.1.27 with the
hotfix applied and put it in a jakarta-tomcat-4.1.27-hotfix1.tar.gz or similar.
creator: drees76@gmail.com

text:
I don't think this bug is a duplicate of #24121 as this bug is meant to address
the general issue of making sure that hotfixes are easy to find.  As it is, the
only download that is easy to find are releases of Tomcat.  The procedure for
releasing hotfixes needs to be changed to ensure that people can easily find them.

creator: funkman@joedog.org
